title: Bharat Mobility Expo 2025 exhibitor list revealed
description: The second Bharat Mobility Global Expo (BMGE), which was earlier known as the Auto Expo will be held from January 17-22, 2025. The event will see participation of more brands than in its first edition. The 2025 Bharat Mobility Global Expo will be held at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi and will have almost all mainstream car brands along with some luxury carmakers. Read on to find out what’s in store. Event to have over 10 mass market car brands EV-only brands like Ather, Ola, Vinfast and BYD to be present Bajaj, Honda, Hero Moto Corp among major two wheeler brands Bharat Mobility Global Expo list of car, SUV brands The confirmed list of mass-market carmakers participating in the event includes Toyota, Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, Mahindra, Tata Motors, Skoda and Volkswagen, Isuzu, Kia and JSW MG Motor India. Luxury car brands like Mercedes-Benz, Audi and BMW have also confirmed their presence. Additionally, Vietnamese EV-only brand Vinfast, which plans to enter India, will also showcase its line-up at the show. Chinese all-EV brand, BYD, will also have its cars and SUVs on display. Bharat Mobility Global Expo list bike, scooter brands Two-wheeler brands like Ather Energy, Bajaj Auto, BMW Motorrad, Honda Scooters, Hero MotoCorp, Yamaha India, Ola Electric, Suzuki Motorcycle India and TVS, among others will be showcase their line-up at the show. Bharat Mobility Global Expo component show details Apart from the event at Bharat Mandapam, there will be a components show as well that will be held between January 18 and 21 at the new Yashobhoomi (India International Convention and Expo Centre) in Dwarka, New Delhi. Stay tuned for a detailed list of new launches and concepts from each automaker.  Also See: Mahindra XEV 9e launched at Rs 21.90 lakh Mahindra BE 6e launched at Rs 18.90 lakh

html:
Previously called the Auto Expo, the BMGE 2025 will have over 25 car and bike makers showcasing their models.

The second Bharat Mobility Global Expo (BMGE), which was earlier known as the Auto Expo will be held from January 17-22, 2025. The event will see participation of more brands than in its first edition. The 2025 Bharat Mobility Global Expo will be held at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi and will have almost all mainstream car brands along with some luxury carmakers. Read on to find out what’s in store.

  1. Event to have over 10 mass market car brands
  2. EV-only brands like Ather, Ola, Vinfast and BYD to be present
  3. Bajaj, Honda, Hero Moto Corp among major two wheeler brands

Bharat Mobility Global Expo list of car, SUV brands

The confirmed list of mass-market carmakers participating in the event includes Toyota, Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, Mahindra, Tata Motors, Skoda and Volkswagen, Isuzu, Kia and JSW MG Motor India. Luxury car brands like Mercedes-Benz, Audi and BMW have also confirmed their presence. Additionally, Vietnamese EV-only brand Vinfast, which plans to enter India, will also showcase its line-up at the show. Chinese all-EV brand, BYD, will also have its cars and SUVs on display.

Bharat Mobility Global Expo list bike, scooter brands

Two-wheeler brands like Ather Energy, Bajaj Auto, BMW Motorrad, Honda Scooters, Hero MotoCorp, Yamaha India, Ola Electric, Suzuki Motorcycle India and TVS, among others will be showcase their line-up at the show.

Bharat Mobility Global Expo component show details

Apart from the event at Bharat Mandapam, there will be a components show as well that will be held between January 18 and 21 at the new Yashobhoomi (India International Convention and Expo Centre) in Dwarka, New Delhi.

Stay tuned for a detailed list of new launches and concepts from each automaker.
